message: Let's get started! I think we can both do better than this, but it's a fair starting point. Your turn!
You were too generous in round 1, I'll take more this time!
You took a big chunk last round, but I'm not backing down. Meet me in the middle!
You're still being too soft on me, I want more!
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me forever! Meet me at 48-52 or walk away!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control now!
I'm not going down without a fight! Take it or leave it!
You're running out of time, I'm taking the majority!
Last chance, Bob! Take this deal or walk away with nothing!
You're trying to lowball me, but I'm not falling for it!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob!
You've pushed me too far, I'm taking it all!
